com.dyuproject.protostuff.LinkedBuffer

Uses of LinkedBuffer in com.dyuproject.protostuff
 

Fields in com.dyuproject.protostuff declared as LinkedBuffer
 LinkedBuffer LinkedBuffer.WriteSession.head
          The main/root/head buffer of this write session.
protected  LinkedBuffer LinkedBuffer.WriteSession.tail
          The last buffer of this write session (This points to head if growing not needed).

static LinkedBuffer StringSerializer.writeUTF8FixedDelimited(String str, LinkedBuffer.WriteSession session, LinkedBuffer lb)
          The length of the utf8 bytes is written first before the string - which is fixed 2-bytes.
static LinkedBuffer StringSerializer.writeUTF8VarDelimited(String str, LinkedBuffer.WriteSession session, LinkedBuffer lb)
          The length of the utf8 bytes is written first before the string - which is a variable int (1 to 5 bytes).
